patterns: How to access my course materials?
access my course materials
responses:
Log In > Dashboard > My Courses > Click a Course 
 You will be able to find all of your course materials, such as syllabus, instructional materials, and assignments.

patterns: How to download course materials?
How to download course materials
Download course materials
responses:
My Courses > Click a course > Click a material 
 Note that you can’t download directly on the site. Some instructors provide a google drive link then you will be able to download the material.

patterns: How to see the participants in a specific course?
How to see participants in a course?
responses:
My courses > Click a Course > Click Participants
 You will be able to view all participants in that specific course, their roles, their groups, and their last access to that course.

patterns: Can I see the active status of my classmates?
responses: Yes, you can see the status of your classmates and other people who are online in your dashboard.

patterns: Can I enroll a new participant?
responses: No, you cannot enroll a new participant in a course.

patterns: How can I see all course categories under the whole PUP OUS?
How to see course categories under PUP OUS?
responses:
Click the logo on the upper left > Scroll down > Click all courses > Open University System
 Scroll down and you will be able to view all the course categories. Use the pagination to navigate all the courses.

patterns: How to view my overall grades in each course?
How to see overall grades in each course?
responses:
My Courses > Click a course > Click Grades 
 You will be able to view your simple weighted mean of your grades on that course.

patterns: Can I see my grade for past assignments?
responses: Yes, you can see your grades from your previous assignments once your instructor assigned grades to it. It will be visible in the Grades section of the course.

patterns: How to submit an assignment?
responses:
Course > Click Assignment > Add Submission
 You will be able to see the time remaining of the submission. You can also add comments.

patterns: How do I know if an assignment has been graded?
responses: Course > Click Assignment  > Navigate the Grading Status > From there, you will see if an assignment has been graded.

patterns: Can I resubmit an assignment multiple times?
Is it ok to resubmit assignment multiple times?
responses: No, you cannot resubmit multiple times, that’s why there is a confirmation before you submit an assignment.

patterns: Is there a size limit in uploading an assignment?
responses: Yes, unfortunately, you can only upload an assignment with a maximum file size of 1 mb.

patterns: How to upload a file?
responses: Go to Private Files > Click the file icon > Add a file > Click Submit Changes

patterns: Can I upload multiple files at once?
responses: Yes, You can upload multiple files at once but be mindful that there is a maximum file size limit of 100 mb.

patterns: Can I create folders to organize my file?
Can I create a folder to organize my file?
responses: Yes, You can create folders to organize your file. To create a folder, click the folder icone > Name your folder > Click Create

patterns: How can I view all the files that I’ve uploaded?
How to view all the files that I’ve uploaded?
responses: It will appear in the empty section of the private files.

patterns: Is there a size limit in uploading a file?
responses: Yes. The file s size limit should not exceed 1 MB.

patterns: Can I delete a file once it's been uploaded?
responses: No. You cannot delete a file once it is been uploaded and if the submission status is already labeled as 'Submitted for grading'

patterns: Can I share private files with my instructor?
responses: No. It is not possible to share your private files to your instructor.

patterns: Are there any restrictions on the types of files I can upload?
responses: No. You can upload any file type as long as it meets the maximum file size.

patterns: Can I access my files from a different device?
responses: Yes. You can I access my files from a different device

patterns: How can I edit my Profile?
How to edit my Profile?
responses: Click the drop-down button beside your name > Click Profile > Click Edit Profile under User Details > Once you are done, click Update Profile

patterns: How to upload a user picture?
responses:
Click the drop-down button beside your name > Click Profile > Click Edit Profile under User Details > Click User Picture > Click the add files icon > Click upload this file > Once done, click update profile 
Note:
Maximum file size = 5mb
Maximum number of files = 1
Accepted file types = .gif .jpe .jpeg .jpg .png

patterns: How can I update my contact information?
How to update my contact number?
responses: Click the drop-down button beside your name > Click Profile > Click Edit Profile under User Details > Click Optional > Once done changing your contact information, click update profile

patterns: How can I change my email address?
How to change email address?
responses: Click the drop-down button beside your name > Click Profile > Click Edit Profile under User Details > Click General > Once done changing the email address, click update profile

patterns: How can I change my password?
How to change password
responses: Click the drop-down button beside your name > Click Preferences  > Click Change Password  > Input your current password > Input your new password > Click Save Changes

patterns: How to hide online status?
How to hide my online status?
responses: Go to Dashboard > Find the online users section > Click the eye icon to hide your online status from other users

patterns: What would happen if I forgot to log out of my portal?
What if I forgot to log out?
responses: Your account will automatically log out if you are inactive.

patterns: Who can I contact if I can’t access my account?
What if I can't access my account?
responses: You can contact us at @pup.edu.ph, or find additional contact information in the footer of our website.

patterns: How to import/export calendar?
responses: Click your Name > Go to Calendar > Click import/export calendar

patterns: How to set a reminder for events?
responses: It is not possible to set reminders for events, however you can view upcoming events in the dashboard under the 'Upcoming events' section.

patterns: How can I view my calendar?
responses: Click your Name > Go to Calendar

patterns: How to add events to my calendar?
responses: Go to Dashboard > Find the upcoming events section > Click Go to Calendar > Click new event

patterns: How to send a message to a student or instructor?
responses: Click the message icon near your Name > Click Contacts > Start messaging

patterns: How to access my inbox to view or reply to a message?
responses: Click the message icon near your Name > Check your inbox under the Starred, Group, Private Section  > Start replying

patterns: How to view my past messages?
responses: Click the message icon near your Name > Check your inbox under the Starred, Group, Private Section  > View your past messages

patterns: How to delete messages?
responses: Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Search specific person name > Click three-dot icon > Click delete conversation.

patterns: Is it possible to send a message to multiple users at once?
responses: Yes, in E-mabini there is a group message created by your instructor. Student are not allowed to create group in E-mabini.

patterns: Can I attach a file to my message?
responses: Sorry! You cannot attach file when using chat feature of E-Mabini, but you are allowed to use emojis.

patterns: Is there an indication that my message has been read?
responses: Sorry! E-Mabini does not have any message indication that your message has been read.

patterns: How to create a group chat?
Can I create a group chat?
Can I create a gc?
responses: Sorry! Students are not allowed to make group chat in E-Mabini.

patterns: How can I change the restriction on who can message me?
responses:
Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click settings icon
 Choose (My Contacts Only or My Contact and anyone in my courses)

patterns: How can I change the restriction on who can message me?
responses:
Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click settings icon
 Choose (My Contacts Only or My Contact and anyone in my courses)

patterns: Where can I find the list of my group chats in e-mabini?
responses: Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click GROUP

patterns: Can I use/can anyone see my personal messaging drawer to save draft messages, links and notes?
responses: Yes, you can! You are the only one who have access to your personal messaging drawer. Therefore, you can use it to save draft messages, links, and notes.

patterns: How do I add someone in my contacts?
responses: Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click Contacts > Search specific name you want to add > Click three-dot icon > Click Add to contacts.

patterns: How to accept contact requests?
responses: Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click Contacts > Click Request

patterns: Where can I see the list of my contacts?
responses: Left side of your profile > Click toggle messaging drawer icon > Click Contacts > Click Contacts.
